name: Rejection
cause: Feeling unwanted or excluded in early life.
behavior: Withdrawal, fear of being seen, perfectionism.
healing: Accept all parts of yourself. Practice radical self-love and visibility.

name: Abandonment
cause: Experiencing emotional or physical absence from caregivers.
healing: Cultivate self-trust and inner stability. Learn to enjoy your own presence.

name: Humiliation
cause: Being shamed for your needs or desires.
healing: Honor your needs. Allow vulnerability with compassion.

name: Betrayal
cause: Broken trust, especially by a parent or partner.
healing: Forgive the past. Learn interdependence with healthy boundaries.

name: Injustice
healing: Embrace flexibility and allow imperfection. Trust divine order.

name: Neglect
healing: Validate your needs and offer daily emotional nurturing.

name: Guilt
cause: Feeling responsible for others' emotions or suffering.
healing: Set emotional boundaries. Know that your worth is not in sacrifice.

name: Fear of Failure
healing: Redefine success. Celebrate effort, not outcome.

name: Fear of Success
healing: Claim your light. Allow yourself to grow and be seen.

name: Unworthiness
healing: Anchor your value in being, not doing. Affirm your right to exist and receive.
